hooks.prompt: Before approving this git commit, validate that the commit message follows conventional commits format. If it doesn't, suggest the correct format and ask the user to confirm or revise.

Before creating or merging this PR, run quality gates to ensure: 1) All CI checks pass, 2) Tests have adequate coverage, 3) No security issues detected, 4) Code quality scores are acceptable. If any gates fail, warn the user and ask for confirmation before proceeding.
After creating this issue, suggest running /issue-triage to properly classify, label, and check for duplicates.
